    • Method Detail

      • act

        public Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservation stateObs,
                ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Description copied from class: AbstractPlayer
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or no action will be applied.
        Specified by:
        act in class AbstractPlayer
        Parameters:
        stateObs - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Gets the player the control to draw something on the screen. It can be used for debug purposes.
        Overrides:
        draw in class AbstractPlayer
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics device to draw to.

        public void printParam()
